topic.title: Cross Sectional Model: Running the Model

para.text: Cross Sectional Model: Running the Model
You are now ready to run the model (File|Export|MODFLOW Input Files
) and import the model results (File|Import|Model Results...

image.title: Import and display model results button

para.text: ). Try importing the heads. The results should look similar to the figure below. It is interesting to note that the highest heads are not located where the ground elevation is highest. Thus, it would be a mistake, in this case, to use the watershed boundary as a no-flow boundary.
